name: Super Mega Master Box Collider Race Fight Tournament Battle Royalle
name_original: Super Mega Master Box Collider Race Fight Tournament Battle Royalle
description:
This is a two players game, the goal is to reach the of the track as it collapses.

Controls: 

Directional: P1 - "A,W,S,D" _  P2 - Arrow Keys

Jump: P1 - "Space" _ P2 - "num pad 0"

Dash: P1 - "E" _ P2 - "num pad 3"
